text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Mm-mmm, isn't Valentine maarveloouuus?☆★ 
All the chocolate makes me feel warm inside♪

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Chocos are a source of happiness! 
Finding one just for you makes you happy☆ 
Now, which choco makes a Biko happy?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Wh- ehh? Which chocolate……? I don't…

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
I'm trying this one today! 
Lookie lookie, earth choco～☆

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Buhh…!? I-It packs a punch, but it doesn't look very tasty…!?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Ahahahaha☆ I wonder? Do you crack this? 
Will caramel come flowing out?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: I-I don't know! I've never had it before!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
That's right, you won't know until you eat it! What you don't 
know is scary! But at the same time, what you don't know 
makes your heart pound☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Once I put it in my mouth it could be 
the most marvelous flavor, right?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: … Ah…

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
――That's right. That chocolate. I haven't eaten it yet. 
I still haven't tasted…… a single bite!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: (What if… it wasn't that bitter?)

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Pfffhh～ I'm so fullll☆

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Whoa!? When did you—?!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaha☆ Which choco do you want, Biko? 
There are all sorts on Valentine's Day… you know?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: ――…… The chocolate I want…

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
There's only one! Thanks, Marvelous. 
… I'm going back!!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Hey, Bono! That bitter chocolate… Is it that one?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Hehh? Biko-chan?! W-Wait— No, that one's bitter—

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: *munch* *munch*… *munch*…… *gulp*

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Oh no…! D'you find it bitter? It's bitter, isn't it?!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: ――It's delicious!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha. Marvelous was right. You won't know 
how it tastes until you try it.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Bono, I ate it. And — it was delicious!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
I liked what you liked but tried to hide away! 
I know because I ate it! And I didn't hate it at all!!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
You see, Bono. It doesn't matter what chocolate it is, just 
give it to me if that's what you want! I might find all of them 
delicious after all!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's right… That's how it is! 
I'm going to go find that girl!!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Haa… huu…… There you are……!

text_block_list.name: Black-clad Young Woman
text_block_list.text: Huehh… You…

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
You're Ryan's fan, aren't you? 
You love Ryan, don't you?!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
I know it's scary to be honest about your feelings. 
But if you don't say anything…… nothing can happen 
and she will never know.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
You can just say you like things that you like! 
How do you know Ryan would dislike that?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Oh, welcome back, Biko! 
… Hm? What's up? That's the girl from…?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Ryan!! Listen to me! 
This girl is a fan of yours!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: … Good luck. I'm with you!

text_block_list.name: Black-clad Young Woman
text_block_list.text: ……! …… I-I love what you do, Ryan! I'm a big fan!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: … Hweh? Th-Thank you! You came all the way here to tell me?

text_block_list.name: Black-clad Young Woman
text_block_list.text: I-I'm sorry to bring down the mood. Ahh, how undeserving I am to be a fan cheering you on…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ehh? Why do you say—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I'm fine, I'm fine! It's too cute for me anyway. 
That kind of thing doesn't suit me at all!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (……Wait, huh……?)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (With "undeserving"… she means the same as I did…?)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
(But… how did I just feel about…? 
What… was I about to tell her……?)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
… That's not true. 
You don't need to overthink things…

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: …… Ryan? You not going back to the dorm?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: —I wonder if that hair ornament is still there.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: You mean… that one? The white flower you didn't buy…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… Mmm. How should I put it…… maybe, umm…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I thought… Just like that girl earlier… 
Maybe I was overthinking things…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ……!? Ines!?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: (I wonder… if she'll accept it now.)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
(At the time, we both fumbled. But now… 
When she's trying to move forward—)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: (I want to back up her resolve. I want to take that step together.)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: (Let me give you the final push — to change.)
